lines.text: BATUS
August 27, 1981
MEMORANDUM:
PROPOSED BATUS-BWT LAW COMMUNICATIONS SYSTEM
This memo outlines a proposed system of law communications
between BATUS and BWT.
Role of BATuS and BwT General Counsels. The communications
system should only operate to support an agreed upon role of
the general counsels. Attached as an appendix are the roles
of the BATuS and Division (Group) General Counsels as set
forth in the 1979 BATUs Organization Notebook. In my
opinion, the roles as defined represent a balanced,
reasonable means of achieving effective legal administration
within our corporate/division system. The definition
emphasizes communications, an essential element for
coordination in any decentralized system. In addition, such
communications are important
order to position the BATUS
General Counsel to report on iegal developments at Board
meetings and to respond to questions on legal matters which
might arise at such meetings
